overview:
Jorge is a founder and also the Technical Director of wiseri.com and has 10 years of industry experience in the internet, financial and banking sectors.

His talent has been employed in a wide variety of roles since starting out in the industry, such as architect, project manager, team leader, programmer and analyst, among others.

Whilst possessing specialized knowledge of Java EE, Spring Framework, JSF, Hibernate and iBatis – to name but a few – he is also passionate about developing new ideas, brainstorming a product and then coding it into existence.

Alongside his long history in software development at companies such as Thales Information Systems and ACOTEL SA, Jorge is also a founding member of AgileCyL and CyLicon Valley, both of which are online meeting points for professionals who share a passion for software development.
